entry.question: What are the tuition fees?
entry.answer: Tuition fees are CHF 700 per semester for Swiss and EU/EFTA citizens as well as for students with a permanent place of residence in Switzerland or the EU/EFTA countries. The fee for all other students is CHF 7500 per semester.

entry.question: Where are the teaching locations?
entry.answer: Teaching is offered mainly in Olten Some elective courses may take place in Basel.

entry.question: Can I change between full and part time studies?
When is the deadline for application?

entry.question: When do the studies start?
entry.answer: Students can start their studies either in September or February.
